name: Match Connect
description:
This game will relax your muscles and upgrade your brain.


Match Connect is a brand new game that all you need to do is tap on the identical tiles on board. When you puzzle the game out, you will find new connections.


Features
Well-designed brain trainer levels.
Pause it whenever you want.

Cute animals, sweet yummy food, cool toys, exciting emojis and much more surprising stuff to connect together.


Match Connect is simple yet relaxing game that may help you to reduce your daily stress, increase your memory capacity and have a great fun time.


Find connections and combine the same happy animals, tasty foods, nice toys, memorable emoji's and much more stuff to find out.
developers: Loop Games Oyun Teknolojileri Anonim Sirketi
publishers: Loop Games Oyun Teknolojileri Anonim Sirketi
